issue.title: Fix initializing db component configuration in ActiveDataProvider

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | ✔️
| New feature?  | ❌
| Breaks BC?    | ❌
| Tests pass?   | ✔️
| Fixed issues  | #18472

body:
@bizley Does that really fix it?
I didn't test it, but just looking at the code 

> If not set, the default DB connection will be used.

if nothing is set, `$this->db` will still be null won't it?
Yes, that shoud fix using non-strings.
Ehm, no. ActiveDataProvider is not using `db` explicitly and in Query there is a check for `db` being `null` (default connection is used then) or not. Or am I missing something?

I extended the ActiveDataProvider and I'm trying to access `$this>db` in my class.
You could as well just change the PHPDoc, I don't care so much about it, because I could switch to `Yii::$app->get('db')` as well. I just wanted to let you know the PHPDoc is not correct at the moment.
Hmm, yes, you are right. It states that it should be usable explicitly. I'll prepare PR.

repository.name: yii2

issue.title: ActiveDataProvider for ElasticSearch broken since v2.0.41

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?

In yii2-elasticsearch run `ActiveDataProviderTest::testQuery`
This will try to instantiate a new `ActiveDataProvider` with the `db` property set to a `yii\elasticsearch\Connection`.

### What is the expected result?

A new `ActiveDataProvider` provider is instantiated.

### What do you get instead?

yii\base\InvalidConfigException: Invalid data type: yii\elasticsearch\Connection. yii\db\Connection is expected.

/home/runner/work/yii2-elasticsearch/yii2-elasticsearch/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/di/Instance.php:157
/home/runner/work/yii2-elasticsearch/yii2-elasticsearch/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/data/ActiveDataProvider.php:91
/home/runner/work/yii2-elasticsearch/yii2-elasticsearch/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/BaseObject.php:109
/home/runner/work/yii2-elasticsearch/yii2-elasticsearch/tests/ActiveDataProviderTest.php:57
/home/runner/work/yii2-elasticsearch/yii2-elasticsearch/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/phpunit:52

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.41
| PHP version      |  - 
| Operating system | -

The `ActiveDataProvider` forces `db` to be a `yii\db\Connection` on line 91.
It looks like that #18472 (fixed in #18473, #18475 and #18476) introduced this behavior.

issue.title: No longer use `set-env` in build.yml
